childrenComponentProp.name: buttonText
childrenComponentProp.docblock: The text of the drop down button.

childrenComponentProp.name: clickHandler
childrenComponentProp.docblock:
A function called when the drop down button is clicked. This is often used
to set the open state in the parent component, which passes down the new
isOpen prop.

childrenComponentProp.name: cssClass
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Any CSS classes to apply to the button itself.

childrenComponentProp.name: dropdownPanelClassNames
childrenComponentProp.docblock: The string of classnames for the dropdown panel container.

childrenComponentProp.name: icon
childrenComponentProp.docblock: An SVG icon to render before the button text.

childrenComponentProp.name: id
childrenComponentProp.docblock: The ID of the <div> surrounding the children.

childrenComponentProp.name: isOpen
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Whether the drop down panel is open.

childrenComponentProp.name: disabled
childrenComponentProp.docblock: The disabled state of the drop down button.
